in the first place.translation[0].defini: used to talk about the beginning of a situation, or the situation before something happened
Why did you agree to meet her in the first place?
He wouldn’t have given you the job in the first place if he didn’t think you could do it.
used to give the first in a list of reasons or points
Her success was secured by two factors. In the first place, she had the support of managers.
in the first place.translation[1].defini: used to introduce a series of points in an argument, discussion etc
In the first place, I’m too busy, and in the second I don’t really want to go.
used to talk about what someone did or should have done at the start of a situation
I wish I’d never got involved in the first place!
